mapper.select:
SELECT et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, es.subject, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master em LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_type et ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = et.exam_type_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_subject es ON em.exam_subject_sequence_no = es.exam_subject_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_organization eo ON et.exam_organization_sequence_no = eo.exam_organization_sequence_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number, COUNT(*) AS wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master
WHERE exam_subject_sequence_no = #{examSubjectSequenceNo}::INT
GROUP BY exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number ) t1 ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = t1.exam_type_sequence_no AND em.exam_subject_sequence_no = t1.exam_subject_sequence_no AND em.problem_number = t1.problem_number
WHERE em.account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT
GROUP BY et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, es.subject, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count ORDER BY t1.wrong_count DESC, et.year DESC, et.month DESC, es.subject DESC, em.problem_number DESC ;

SELECT et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, es.subject, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master em LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_type et ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = et.exam_type_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_subject es ON em.exam_subject_sequence_no = es.exam_subject_sequence_no LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_organization eo ON et.exam_organization_sequence_no = eo.exam_organization_sequence_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number, COUNT(*) AS wrong_count FROM jwland.exam_master GROUP BY exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number ) t1 ON em.exam_type_sequence_no = t1.exam_type_sequence_no AND em.exam_subject_sequence_no = t1.exam_subject_sequence_no AND em.problem_number = t1.problem_number WHERE em.account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT GROUP BY et.year, et.month, eo.exam_organization_name, es.subject, em.problem_number, t1.wrong_count ORDER BY t1.wrong_count DESC, et.year DESC, et.month DESC, es.subject DESC, em.problem_number DESC ;
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM jwland.exam_type ORDER BY year
SELECT DISTINCT month FROM jwland.exam_type WHERE year = #{year}::INT ORDER BY month

SELECT et.exam_type_sequence_no, eo.exam_organization_name FROM jwland.exam_type et LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_organization eo ON et.exam_organization_sequence_no = eo.exam_organization_sequence_no WHERE year = #{year}::INT AND month = #{month}::INT ORDER BY et.exam_type_sequence_no
SELECT exam_organization_sequence_no, exam_organization_name FROM jwland.exam_organization ORDER BY exam_organization_sequence_no

SELECT exam_subject_sequence_no, subject FROM jwland.exam_subject WHERE exam_subject_sequence_no NOT IN ( SELECT exam_subject_sequence_no FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE exam_type_sequence_no = #{examTypeSequenceNo}::INT AND account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT ) ORDER BY exam_subject_sequence_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jwland.exam_master(exam_type_sequence_no, exam_subject_sequence_no, problem_number, account_sequence_no) VALUES(#{examTypeSequenceNo}, #{examSubjectSequenceNo}, #{problemNumber}, #{accountSequenceNo})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM jwland.exam_type WHERE exam_type_sequence_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT exam_type_sequence_no FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT ) GROUP BY year ;

SELECT DISTINCT month FROM jwland.exam_type WHERE exam_type_sequence_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT exam_type_sequence_no FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT ) AND year = #{year}::INT ORDER BY month

SELECT et.exam_type_sequence_no, eo.exam_organization_name FROM jwland.exam_type et LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_organization eo ON et.exam_organization_sequence_no = eo.exam_organization_sequence_no WHERE exam_type_sequence_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT exam_type_sequence_no FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT ) AND et.year = #{year} ::INT AND et.month = #{month}::INT ORDER BY et.exam_type_sequence_no ;

SELECT em.exam_subject_sequence_no, es.subject FROM jwland.exam_master em LEFT JOIN jwland.exam_subject es ON em.exam_subject_sequence_no = es.exam_subject_sequence_no WHERE exam_type_sequence_no = #{examTypeSequenceNo}::INT AND account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT GROUP BY em.exam_subject_sequence_no, es.subject ;

SELECT problem_number FROM jwland.exam_master WHERE exam_type_sequence_no = #{examTypeSequenceNo}::INT AND exam_subject_sequence_no = #{examSubjectSequenceNo}::INT AND account_sequence_no = #{accountSequenceNo}::INT ;
